query.SELECT_CONCERT_HALL: select distinct CONCERT_HALL.ID, NAME, LOCATION, CAPACITY, count(*) as ASSIGNED from CONCERT_HALL, CONCERT where CONCERT_HALL.ID = CONCERT.CONCERT_HALL_ID order by ID
query.SELECT_CONCERT: select distinct ID, NAME, TYPE, PRICE, count(*) as BOOKED from CONCERT, RESERVATION where CONCERT.ID = RESERVATION.CONCERT_ID order by ID
query.SELECT_AUDIENCES: select ID, NAME, GENDER, AGE from AUDIENCE order by ID
query.SELECT_PERFORMANCE: select * from CONCERT_HALL where ID='%s' and 1 = %s
query.DROP_TEST: drop table RESERVATION, CONCERT, AUDIENCE, CONCERT_HALL;
